column4: hello. i he just installed ubuntu 9.04 and i have problem with the sound! i can't hear sound from amarok + firefox (youtube) together....what can i do?
or the PCM set to low
you have gnome?
yes i have gnome
right click the sound icon and open volume controls
what is given there?
HDA Intel (ALSA Mixer)    all to full
click prefrences
then select everything under placyback,and set everything to high again
nothing happend
you sure?? playback still not working?
i said that i can hear music
then??
but i can't hear sound from youtube (firefox) TOGETHER
ah,as in Amarok+firefox,i cant do that too
so how can i solve this?
http://ubuntuforums.org/archive/index.php/t-922344.html
sudo apt-get install libflashsupport
Package libflashsupport has no installation candidate
yeah,was checking that out,try sudo apt-get install flashplugin-nonfree-extrasound
install that the
